movie_title: Interpol crackdown on illicit pharmaceuticals worth US$1.5m in Malaysia
introduction: One of the world's largest crackdowns on online sales of illicit pharmaceuticals has just wrapped up

vocabulary.definition: forbidden by law, rules, or custom
vocabulary.example: The authorities discovered tens of thousands of boxes filled with illicit medicine during the raid.

vocabulary.definition: the action of sharing something out among a number of recipients
vocabulary.example: The warehouses targeted were believed to be distribution hubs for illegal pharmaceuticals.

vocabulary.definition: to stop or catch someone or something before they can reach a particular place
vocabulary.example: Authorities intercepted travelers arriving with large quantities of unregistered medicine at the airport.

vocabulary.definition: to hide the real appearance or nature of something
vocabulary.example: The imports were disguised as personal use but were intended for sale.

vocabulary.definition: to take hold of suddenly or forcibly
vocabulary.example: Authorities seized over 7 million ringit worth of health products during the operation.

vocabulary.definition: made in exact imitation of something valuable with the intention to deceive or defraud
vocabulary.example: The trade in counterfeit medicine poses a threat to public health worldwide.
